title: Thursday's High School Sports Scores & Highlights
text:
Thursday's High School Sports Scores & Highlights Posted: Updated: Albemarle's Stephanie Lugas led the Patriots to a 3-0 win over CHS 
The Albemarle High School volleyball team improved to 10-0 in the Jefferson District and 20-1 overall with a 3-0 win over Charlottesville. Ellie Benning had a game-high 19 assists. Here are some other scores: 
VOLLEYBALL 
Western Albemarle 3, Fluvanna 1Louisa County 3, Orange County 1Powhatan 3, Monticello 0Rappahannock 3, Madison County 1R.E. Lee 3, Waynesboro 1 
FIELD HOCKEY 
St. Catherine's 2, Covenant 2Powhatan 2, Monticello 0Orange County 5, Louisa County 1 
BOYS SOCCER 
STAB 0, Steward 0 F/OT 
Trinity Episcopal 7, Covenant 2 Thursday's High School Sports Scores & Highlights More>> Marty Hudtloff is the Sports Director at WVIR-TV. He joined the NBC29 sports team in October of 2003. He has a degree in broadcast journalism from Bradley University. Email / Full Story Sign Up for Email Alerts

Ellie Benning had a game-high 19 assists. Full Story The Albemarle High School volleyball team improved to 10-0 in the Jefferson District and 20-1 overall with a 3-0 win over Charlottesville. Ellie Benning had a game-high 19 assists. Full Story Updated: Thursday, October 15 2015 6:45 PM EDT 2015-10-15 22:45:08 GMT The Virginia men's basketball team is ranked #6 in the USA Today Coaches Preseason Poll, which is UVa's highest ranking since debuting at #1 before the 1982 season. Full Story The Virginia men's basketball team is ranked #6 in the USA Today Coaches Preseason Poll, which is UVa's highest ranking since debuting at #1 before the 1982 season. Full Story Updated: Thursday, October 15 2015 6:10 PM EDT 2015-10-15 22:10:41 GMT Wilson made nine appearances with the Orioles in 2015. He made five starts, three of them were considered quality starts. Wilson finished the season with a 2-2 record and a solid 3.50 ERA. Full Story Wilson made nine appearances with the Orioles in 2015. He made five starts, three of them were considered quality starts. Wilson finished the season with a 2-2 record and a solid 3.50 ERA. Full Story Updated: Wednesday, October 14 2015 9:37 PM EDT 2015-10-15 01:37:34 GMT Coach Buzz Williams says he may be forced to redshirt sophomore guard Ahmed Hill. Hill has a partial-tear in a tendon in his left knee. Hill averaged 8.7 points per game and 3.7 rebounds last season as a freshman. Full Story Coach Buzz Williams says he may be forced to redshirt sophomore guard Ahmed Hill. Hill has a partial-tear in a tendon in his left knee. Hill averaged 8.7 points per game and 3.7 rebounds last season as a freshman. Full Story Wednesday, October 14 2015 6:47 PM EDT 2015-10-14 22:47:10 GMT Syracuse true freshman quarterback Eric Dungey leads the ACC with a quarterback rating of 169.3 The UVa football team will face a true freshman quarterback for the third time this season Saturday, as Syracuse pays a visit to Scott Stadium. Full Story The UVa football team will face a true freshman quarterback for the third time this season Saturday, as Syracuse pays a visit to Scott Stadium. Full Story Wednesday, October 14 2015 6:33 PM EDT 2015-10-14 22:33:26 GMT The Lions defeated the Warriors 56-26 in 2014 The NBC 29/McDonald's Tailgate Party will be at Louisa County High School Friday night, as the Lions host to Western Albemarle. Full Story The NBC 29/McDonald's Tailgate Party will be at Louisa County High School Friday night, as the Lions host to Western Albemarle. Full Story Wednesday, October 14 2015 7:54 AM EDT 2015-10-14 11:54:27 GMT UVa was shut out for the first time in 2015 by American The 12th ranked Virginia men's soccer team was shut out for the first time this season in a 1-0 loss to American. Full Story The 12th ranked Virginia men's soccer team was shut out for the first time this season in a 1-0 loss to American. Full Story Updated: Wednesday, October 14 2015 7:49 AM EDT 2015-10-14 11:49:19 GMT Adisa Gittens-Smith rushed for 157 yards and a touchdown in Fork Union's 26-14 win Friday over St. Christopher's. Full Story Adisa Gittens-Smith rushed for 157 yards and a touchdown in Fork Union's 26-14 win Friday over St. Christopher's. Full Story Tuesday, October 13 2015 10:59 PM EDT 2015-10-14 02:59:10 GMT AHS defeated OCHS in both volleyball and field hockey The Albemarle volleyball team improved to 18-1 and 9-0 in the Jefferson District with a 3-0 (25-7, 25-13, 25-10) win over Orange County. Full Story The Albemarle volleyball team improved to 18-1 and 9-0 in the Jefferson District with a 3-0 (25-7, 25-13, 25-10) win over Orange County. Full Story Monday, October 12 2015 9:11 PM EDT 2015-10-13 01:11:51 GMT The UVa pitching staff played a key role in the Cavaliers first-ever national title The Virginia Baseball program will hold the 2016 Step Up to the Plate event and 2015 National Championship Ring Ceremony on Saturday, Jan. 30, 2015, at 6 p.m. at JPJ. The annual fundraiser is one of the highlights of the Virginia Baseball calendar, but takes on a special tone this year as UVA also will present its first NCAA championship team with its national championship rings. The annual fundraiser is one of the highlights of the Virginia Baseball calendar, but takes on a special tone this year as UVA also will present its first NCAA championship team with its national championship rings.
